page.title: 15POPULATION COMPARISONS.
page.content: Take for instance the City of London; it would be very unlikley that the people living there would know someone in the next street, but in our block it is much different, both Lesbury and Hipsburn villages are quite small and the people living there would probably know their neighbours well enough to call them by name in the street. There are not many children in our block so there is only one school, which is a primary school with only 58 children attending. When the children reach the age of nine they go on to Lindisfarne Middle School, which is in Alnwick three miles away, so they have to catch a bus each morning. There they are joined by children from other first schools near Alnwick.
